Ref: CXP119/2024

PLANT MANAGER

Ref: CXP119/2024

WASTE-WATER TREATMENT INDUSTRY
To manage the DWR operations team in the operation of the wastewater treatment plant for the production of reclaimed water meeting the required contractual standards.
Salary R35 000 – R45 000 – depending on skills, qualifications and experience
Location: Durban

Criteria:
National Diploma in related field or assessed equivalent competence
Minimum of 5 years supervisory / management experience in water/ wastewater treatment industry
Capable in process diagnostics, plant maintenance and cost optimization
Able to manage and lead staff
Computer literacy in the Google Workspace tools and experience with Cloud Computing and SAAS tools such as DocuSign, Lucid Chart
Fluent communication and report writing skills

Apply via: https://forms.gle/8mRbBqpY1WY7fSPs7
